allow: Bash(start "OBEDIO Backend" cmd /k "cd backend && npm run dev")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Migrate Service Requests settings to backend API + Remove hardcoded values

Major Changes:
- Extended UserPreferences database model with 12 Service Requests fields
- Added PUT /api/user-preferences/service-requests endpoint
- Extended useUserPreferences hook with updateServiceRequests mutation
- Removed ALL localStorage usage from Service Requests components
- Fixed hardcoded crew ID in Service Requests page (now uses authenticated user)
- Fixed deprecated updateUserPreferences in Settings page
- Added warning banner for disconnected role permissions feature

Database:
- Added 12 fields to UserPreferences table via Prisma schema
- Fields: serviceRequestDisplayMode, serviceRequestViewStyle, serviceRequestSortOrder,
  serviceRequestShowGuestPhotos, serviceRequestServingTimeout, serviceRequestSoundAlerts,
  serviceRequestVisualFlash, serviceRequestResponseWarning, serviceRequestAutoArchive,
  serviceRequestAutoPriorityVIP, serviceRequestAutoPriorityMaster, requestDialogRepeatInterval

Backend:
- Extended existing /api/user-preferences routes (no new route files)
- GET returns all 12 new fields with defaults
- PUT /service-requests updates settings with upsert pattern

Frontend:
- Extended UserPreferencesDTO interface with 12 new fields
- Extended userPreferencesApi with updateServiceRequests method
- Extended useUserPreferences hook with new mutation
- Updated service-requests-settings-dialog to use backend API
- Updated service-requests page to load preferences from backend
- Fixed settings page to use correct updateServiceRequests method

Documentation:
- Created SERVICE-REQUESTS-MIGRATION-REVIEW.md with comprehensive audit
- Archived 67 old documentation files to docs/archive/old-docs-2025-11-01/
- Verified NO duplicate APIs or database tables created (100% infrastructure reuse)

Testing:
- Backend API tested via curl - GET and PUT working correctly
- Settings persist in PostgreSQL database
- Changes survive server restart

Generated with Claude Code
EOF
)")
